articles.title: Roku Channel deal with Lionsgate will bring John Wick 4, Borderlands to free streaming - The Verge
articles.description: Roku and Lionsgate will offer the studio’s theatrical releases on the ad-supported Roku Channel after they air on Starz. The deal starts with Lionsgate’s 2022 movies, so Roku will be the first channel streaming John Wick 4 for free.
